00025 #include "syx-memory.h"
00026 #include "syx-types.h"

00032 #include "syx-interp.h"

00034 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00035 
00036 #ifdef HAVE_LIBDL
00037   #include <dlfcn.h>
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifdef HAVE_WINDOWS_H
00041   #include <windows.h>
00042   #include <winbase.h>
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 static SyxPluginEntry *_syx_plugins = NULL;
00046 static syx_int32 _syx_plugins_top = 0;
00047 static syx_string *_syx_plugins_path = NULL;
00048 static syx_int32 _syx_plugins_path_top = 0;
00049 
00050 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00051 
00057 void
00058 syx_plugins_init (void)
00059 {
00060 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00061   syx_int32 size = 0;
00062   syx_string path, token;
00063 
00064   /* Obtain the full path including SYX_PLUGIN_PATH env variable when possible */
00065   size += strlen (SYX_PLUGIN_PATH);
00066 #ifdef HAVE_GETENV
00067   if (getenv ("SYX_PLUGIN_PATH"))
00068     size += strlen (getenv ("SYX_PLUGIN_PATH")) + 1;
00069 #endif
00070   path = (syx_string) syx_malloc (size+1);
00071   strcpy (path, SYX_PLUGIN_PATH);
00072 #ifdef HAVE_GETENV
00073   if (getenv ("SYX_PLUGIN_PATH"))
00074     {
00075       strcat (path, SYX_ENV_PATH_SEPARATOR_S);
00076       strcat (path, getenv ("SYX_PLUGIN_PATH"));
00077     }
00078 #endif
00079   path[size] = '\0';
00080 
00081   token = strtok (path, ":;");
00082   while (token)
00083     {
00084       _syx_plugins_path = (syx_string *)syx_realloc (_syx_plugins_path, ++_syx_plugins_path_top * sizeof (syx_string));
00085       _syx_plugins_path[_syx_plugins_path_top-1] = syx_strdup (token);
00086       token = strtok (NULL, ":;");
00087     }
00088   syx_free (path);
00089 
00090 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00091 }
00092 
00098 void
00099 syx_plugins_quit (void)
00100 {
00101 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00102   syx_int32 i;
00103   for (i=0; i < _syx_plugins_path_top; i++)
00104     syx_free (_syx_plugins_path[i]);
00105   syx_free (_syx_plugins_path);
00106 
00107   syx_plugin_finalize_all ();
00108 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00109 }
00110 
00111 static SyxOop
00112 _syx_plugin_default_method (void)
00113 {
00114 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00115   SyxOop method;
00116   SyxLexer *lexer;
00117   SyxParser *parser;
00118 
00119   syx_memory_gc_begin ();
00120 
00121   method = syx_method_new ();
00122   lexer = syx_lexer_new ("defaultPluginsFailMethod self primitiveFailed");
00123   parser = syx_parser_new (lexer, method, syx_nil);
00124   syx_parser_parse (parser, FALSE);
00125 
00126   syx_lexer_free (lexer, FALSE);
00127   syx_parser_free (parser, FALSE);
00128 
00129   syx_memory_gc_end ();
00130   return method;
00131 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00132 }
00133 
00140 syx_pointer
00141 syx_library_open (syx_symbol location)
00142 {
00143   syx_pointer ret = NULL;
00144 
00145 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00146 
00147 #ifndef HAVE_LIBDL
00148   ret = LoadLibrary (SYX_IFDEF_UNICODE (location));
00149 #else /* HAVE_LIBDL */
00150   ret = dlopen (location, RTLD_NOW);
00151 
00152 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_INFO
00153   if (!ret)
00154     puts (dlerror ());
00155 #endif /* SYX_DEBUG_INFO */
00156 
00157 #endif /* HAVE_LIBDL */
00158 
00159 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00160   return ret;
00161 }
00162 
00170 syx_pointer
00171 syx_library_symbol (syx_pointer handle, syx_symbol name)
00172 {
00173   syx_pointer ret = NULL;
00174 
00175 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00176 
00177   if (!handle || !name)
00178     return NULL;
00179 
00180 #ifndef HAVE_LIBDL
00181   ret = (syx_pointer)(syx_nint) GetProcAddress (handle, SYX_IFDEF_UNICODE (name));
00182 #else /* HAVE_LIBDL */
00183   ret = dlsym (handle, name);
00184 
00185 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_INFO
00186   if (!ret)
00187     puts (dlerror ());
00188 #endif /* SYX_DEBUG_INFO */
00189 
00190 #endif /* HAVE_LIBDL */
00191 
00192 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00193 
00194   return ret;
00195 }
00196 
00203 syx_bool
00204 syx_library_close (syx_pointer handle)
00205 {
00206 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00207   
00208   if (!handle)
00209     return TRUE;
00210 
00211 #ifndef HAVE_LIBDL
00212   FreeLibrary (handle);
00213   return TRUE;
00214 #else
00215   if (dlclose (handle) == 0)
00216     return TRUE;
00217   else
00218     return FALSE;
00219 #endif /* HAVE_LIBDL */
00220 
00221 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00222 
00223   return TRUE;
00224 }
00225 
00232 syx_pointer
00233 syx_plugin_load (syx_symbol name)
00234 {
00235   syx_pointer handle = NULL;
00236 
00237 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00238   syx_string location;
00239   syx_string namext;
00240   SyxPluginInitializeFunc func;
00241   SyxPluginEntry *entry;
00242   syx_int32 i;
00243 
00244   if (name)
00245     {
00246       namext = syx_calloc (strlen (name) + 15, sizeof (syx_char));
00247       
00248       /* use syx-name.dll instead of libsyx-name.dll on Windows */
00249 #ifndef WINDOWS
00250       strcpy (namext, "lib");
00251 #endif
00252       
00253       strcat (namext, "syx-");
00254       strcat (namext, name);
00255       
00256 #ifdef WINDOWS
00257       strcat (namext, ".dll");
00258 #else
00259       strcat (namext, ".so");
00260 #endif /* WINDOWS */
00261 
00262 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_INFO
00263       syx_debug ("Loading plugin %s\n", name);
00264 #endif
00265 
00266       /* Try all possible paths */
00267       for (handle=NULL, i=0; !handle && i < _syx_plugins_path_top; i++)
00268         {
00269           location = (syx_string) syx_calloc (strlen (SYX_PLUGIN_PATH)
00270                                               + strlen (name)
00271                                               + strlen (namext) + 3, sizeof (syx_char));
00272           sprintf (location, "%s%c%s%c%s",
00273                    SYX_PLUGIN_PATH, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR,
00274                    name, SYX_PATH_SEPARATOR,
00275                    namext);
00276 
00277           handle = syx_library_open (location);
00278           syx_free (location);
00279         }
00280 
00281       syx_free (namext);
00282     }
00283   else
00284     handle = syx_library_open (NULL);
00285 
00286   if (!handle)
00287     return NULL;
00288 
00289   if (name)
00290     {
00291       func = (SyxPluginInitializeFunc)(long) syx_library_symbol (handle, "syx_plugin_initialize");
00292       if (!func)
00293         return NULL;
00294       
00295       if (!func ())
00296         return NULL;
00297     }
00298 
00299   _syx_plugins = syx_realloc (_syx_plugins, ++_syx_plugins_top * sizeof (SyxPluginEntry));
00300   entry = _syx_plugins + _syx_plugins_top - 1;
00301   entry->name = (name ? syx_strdup (name) : NULL);
00302   entry->handle = handle;
00303 
00304 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00305 
00306   return handle;
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 
00319 syx_bool
00320 syx_plugin_unload (syx_symbol plugin)
00321 {
00322 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00323   SyxPluginEntry *entry;
00324   SyxPluginFinalizeFunc func;
00325   syx_bool ret;
00326 
00327   if (!plugin)
00328     return TRUE;
00329 
00330 #ifdef SYX_DEBUG_INFO
00331   syx_debug ("Unloading plugin %s\n", plugin);
00332 #endif
00333 
00334   for (entry=_syx_plugins; entry < _syx_plugins + _syx_plugins_top; entry++)
00335     {
00336       if (!strcmp (entry->name, plugin))
00337         {
00338           func = (SyxPluginFinalizeFunc)(long) syx_library_symbol (entry->handle, "syx_plugin_finalize");
00339           if (!func)
00340             return FALSE;
00341 
00342           func ();
00343 
00344           ret = syx_library_close (entry->handle);
00345           syx_free (entry->name);
00346           entry->name = entry->handle = NULL;
00347 
00348           return ret;
00349         }
00350     }
00351 
00352 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00353 
00354   return TRUE;
00355 }
00356 
00362 void
00363 syx_plugin_finalize_all (void)
00364 {
00365 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00366   SyxPluginEntry *entry;
00367   SyxPluginFinalizeFunc func;
00368 
00369   for (entry=_syx_plugins; entry < _syx_plugins + _syx_plugins_top; entry++)
00370     {
00371       if (!entry->name)
00372         continue;
00373 
00374       func = (SyxPluginFinalizeFunc)(long) syx_library_symbol (entry->handle, "syx_plugin_finalize");
00375       if (!func)
00376         return;
00377 
00378       func ();
00379 
00380       syx_library_close (entry->handle);
00381       syx_free (entry->name);
00382     }
00383 
00384   syx_free (_syx_plugins);
00385   _syx_plugins_top = 0;
00386 
00387 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00388 
00389 }
00390 
00398 syx_pointer
00399 syx_plugin_symbol (syx_symbol plugin_name, syx_symbol symbol_name)
00400 {
00401 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00402 
00403   SyxPluginEntry *entry;
00404   syx_pointer handle;
00405 
00406   for (entry=_syx_plugins; entry < _syx_plugins + _syx_plugins_top; entry++)
00407     {
00408       if ((!plugin_name && entry->name) || (plugin_name && !entry->name))
00409         continue;
00410 
00411       if (plugin_name && entry->name && strcmp (plugin_name, entry->name))
00412         continue;
00413 
00414       return syx_library_symbol (entry->handle, symbol_name);
00415     }
00416 
00417   /* try loading the plugin if not loaded yet */
00418   handle = syx_plugin_load (plugin_name);
00419   if (!handle)
00420     return NULL;
00421 
00422   /* finally lookup the symbol again */
00423   return syx_library_symbol (handle, symbol_name);
00424 
00425 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00426 
00427   return NULL;
00428 }
00429 
00439 syx_bool
00440 syx_plugin_call_interp (SyxInterpState *es, SyxOop method)
00441 {
00442 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00443   SyxOop *literals;
00444   SyxOop plugin_oop;
00445   syx_symbol plugin = NULL;
00446   syx_symbol func;
00447 
00448   literals = SYX_OBJECT_DATA(SYX_CODE_LITERALS(method));
00449   plugin_oop = literals[1];
00450   /* if plugin is NULL, the function is looked up in the main program */
00451   if (!SYX_IS_NIL (plugin_oop))
00452     plugin = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(plugin_oop);
00453   func = SYX_OBJECT_SYMBOL(literals[0]);
00454 
00455   return syx_plugin_call (es, plugin, func, method);
00456 
00457 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00458 
00459   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00460 }
00461 
00473 syx_bool
00474 syx_plugin_call (SyxInterpState *es, syx_symbol plugin_name, syx_symbol func_name, SyxOop method)
00475 {
00476 #ifdef WITH_PLUGINS
00477   SyxPrimitiveFunc fp;
00478 
00479   if (SYX_IS_NIL (method))
00480     method = _syx_plugin_default_method ();
00481 
00482   fp = (SyxPrimitiveFunc)(long) syx_plugin_symbol (plugin_name, func_name);
00483   if (fp)
00484     return fp (es, method);
00485 #endif /* WITH_PLUGINS */
00486 
00487   SYX_PRIM_FAIL;
00488 }
